A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Liberal undertones are scattered everywhere in the film that is\, like the whole franchise states\, in a galaxy far far away. Im sure in a galaxy far far away people are above inserting their own political agendas into a movie. Not mention this is a fictional galaxy\, trying to implement todays liberal ideologies onto it.
